description: Zoho Mail is a secure and ad-free email hosting platform with collaboration tools, calendar integration, and extensive administrative controls

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_DOMAIN_OPERATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to perform domain operations like verify, set primary domain, hosting, aliases, MX/SPF checks, DKIM management, and notifications. Use after creating or retrieving a domain.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_GROUPS_DELETE_GROUP_BULK
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk delete multiple groups. Use when you need to remove several groups in one API call.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_GROUPS_DELETE_GROUP_BY_ZGID
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific mail group by its zgid. Use when you need to remove a group from your organization after confirming the IDs.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_ORGANIZATION_GET_USER_STORAGE_DETAILS

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_ORGANIZATION_UPDATE_SPAM_PROCESS_TYPE
capabilities.description: Tool to update organization spam processing type. Use when changing the spam filtering strategy for an organization.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_ORGANIZATION_UPDATE_USER_STORAGE

capabilities.name: ZOHO_MAIL_UPDATE_GROUP_SETTINGS
